  <h1>Setting up Visual Studio for Tingen Web Service development</h1>

</div>

<br/>

These instructions can be used to setup a development environment in either Visual Studio 2022 or Visual Studio 2026

1. Start the Visual Studio 2022 or Visual Studio 2026 installer

2. Verify the following **Workloads** are checked

* ASP.NET and web development
* Azure development
* .NET desktop development

3. Verify the following **Individual components** are checked

* .NET > .NET Framework 4.8 SDK
* .NET > .NET Framework 4.8 targeting pack
* .NET > .NET Framework 4.8.1 SDK
* .NET > .NET Framework 4.8.1 targeting pack
* .NET > .NET Framework project and item templates

4. Click **Install**

***
